name: Yatzee
overview: This game can be played by up to three people or two people and the Spectrum. Each competitor is asked to enter their name before the game starts. You can then select the type of competition: A fixed number of games, press F and then enter the number required; First to a set score, press P and then enter the score target required; Unspecified, press U, to play single games. For the game there are 5 dice lettered A B C D E, these are displayed at the bottom of the screen below the score chart. At each turn, each person is allowed to roll the dice 3 times. On the first roll all the dice are rolled, for the second and third rolls any number of dice may be held by entering the letters of the dice to be held. After the first and second rolls, in addition to holding dice, you have the options to: press 0 to score; press I for instructions; press Q to quit; press enter to roll all the dice. You must select a scoring option after the third roll. To score, simply enter the number of the scoring option that you require.
